item.title: Npc handler
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok here is all the text updates that i changed:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 660) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Altec")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "We are Altec's Protectors"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "We are Altec's Loyal Guards"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 660) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Altec")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "We fight Valiantly"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "We follow him without quesitons"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 660) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Altec")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Quite often we sing to sing, I Love Altec"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Quite often we sing to sing, I Love Altec"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 660) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Altec")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Altec is Online"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner Altec is Offline"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 524) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Logs and Spades here"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 579) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Your Cannon here"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 520) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Trimmed Armor Here"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 550) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Lots of Ranged Stuff"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 546) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Mage Things"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1658) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "More Mage Stuff"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 548) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Your food Here"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 536) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I got Potions"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 747) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Dragon and Barrows Stuff Here"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Lots of Rares"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1699) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I sell Ghostly Stuff!!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 522) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Bronze and Iron(Yes, im a nub)"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1917) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Gloves and Boots can Make You Cool"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 523) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Bling Store"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1199) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Trampscape!";
some things i changed work, but not those. i believe my server base is pimpscape.
